item.title: CIFD: Controlled Information Flow to Enhance Knowledge Distillation
item.description: CIFD, a novel knowledge distillation method, drastically cuts training costs while boosting performance, particularly for large datasets, by using Rate-Distortion Modules instead of Teacher Assistants…

item.title: DISP-LLM: Dimension-Independent Structural Pruning for Large Language Models
item.description: DISP-LLM: A novel dimension-independent structural pruning method for LLMs achieves accuracy similar to semi-structural pruning while improving flexibility and efficiency, outperforming state-of-the-a…

item.title: EnsIR: An Ensemble Algorithm for Image Restoration via Gaussian Mixture Models
item.description: EnsIR: Training-free image restoration ensemble via Gaussian mixture models, boosting accuracy efficiently.
